text: Dhaigabaram di'am patani'am te apane pita tom (parada karana) de sabadha vica ko'i papa nahim. Ate na apane putaram de sabadha vica ate na apane bharavam de sabadha vica ate na apane bhatiji'am, bhanaji'am, apane jihi'am auratam ate na apani'am dasi'am tom (parada karana de sabadha vica ko'i papa hai) ate tusim alaha tom daradi'am raho. Besaka alaha hara ciza te nazara rakhada hai
